title: Technical SEO WordPress/Web Developer
job_overview:
practiceedge is an Australian-based digital marketing agency focused on helping businesses achieve outstanding results and growth. We offer a range of services, including web design, graphic design, SEO, Google Ads, and more, with a commitment to delivering the promise. Join our dynamic, creative team that encourages ambition and results. 

The Job: 

Weâ€™re looking for a Technical SEO WordPress/Web Developer with a strong understanding of SEO. As part of our growing team, you will be responsible for maintaining technical excellence across multiple client websites, ensuring high performance and optimal search engine rankings. 

Key Responsibilities: 

Manage the technical SEO aspects of client websites 

Maintain and improve website technical health, with most websites using Wordpress and page builders such as Elementor, Divi, Avada, and WP Bakery. 

Utilise tools such as Ahrefs and Screaming Frog for SEO technical audits and fixes. 

Implement fixes and page speed optimisation 

Additional tasks may include, but are not limited to, Google Tag Manager setup and integration, creating and implementing website schema markup, troubleshooting etc. 

Essential Skills and Experience: 

Proficient in WordPress, including popular page builders (Elementor, Divi, Avada, WP Bakery). 

HTML and PHP familiarity will be required at times.  

Experienced with SEO tools like Ahrefs and Screaming Frog. 

A good understanding of SEO best practices, experienced, with a strong focus on technical SEO. 

Experience in improving website page speed and technical SEO. 

Excellent written and spoken English communication skills. 

Ideal Candidate: 

Familiar with best practices in page speed improvements. 

Knowledge of Google Tag Manager and website schema markup. 

A self-motivated and organised individual with the ability to work independently in a remote environment. 

Strong communication skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with teaUpgrade to see actual infombers and clients. 

To apply, please submit: 

A cover letter and introductory video outlining why you believe you are a great fit for the role. Applications without a video will not be considered. 

Your updated resume.
